EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_The Cloud Native Journey Q415.Invite - Do not use
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Pivotal's Cloud Native Journey Webinar 10/6
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinarhttp://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&> Tuesday, October 6, 2015 REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar> Webinar: The Cloud Native Journey The ability to deliver software is no longer a differentiator. In fact, it is a basic requirement for survival. Companies that embrace cloud-native patterns of software delivery will survive; companies that donâ€™t will not.
Register now <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar> to join Matt Stine <http://blog.pivotal.io/author/mstine>, Sr. Product Manager, Spring Cloud Services for Pivotal Cloud Foundry, as we look at the common patterns that distinguish cloud native companies and the architectures that they employ. We'll discover that an opinionated platform, one that stretches from the infrastructure all the way to the application framework, rather than ad-hoc automation, is an essential component to an enterprise's cloud native journey. Join us <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar> on Tuesday, October 6 and we will show that the combination of Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Spring is that platform.
We hope you can join us!
The Pivotal Team
